title: Twin sisters: One dead, one searching for a killer.  Who murdered Jody LeCornu?
itunes:title: Twin sisters: One dead, one searching for a killer.  Who murdered Jody LeCornu?
description:
Jennifer LeCornu Carrieri has been looking for the person responsible for her twin sister's death for more than 20 years. She's paid for multiple billboards in Baltimore pleading for information. Jennifer LeCornu Carrieri joins Nancy Grace and Sheryl McCollum, Director of the Cold Case Investigative Research Institute to discuss her investigation.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
